name: HoloTEMPUS Fangame
description:
Happy Birthday to Dez!

I made this Fangame to celebrate Dez's birthday. This is an RPG  game with a  story based on the TEMPUS MANGA. 
THE HBD Special story will be open after finish the main story. 
Estimated Playing Time is about 1-2 hours.

It's my first time to try to make an RPG game, so bugs that interfere with play may be found. If there is any suggestions or feedback, please feel free to contact me on twitter or マシュマロ .

I try to adjust the frequency of encounters, but it doesn't work effectively. If you don't want to battle too many times, it is recommended to escapes directly.   

**English isn’t my first language, I apologize for any mistakes I might make.

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow Keys
Action/OK - Enter, Z, Space
Cancel/Menu - Esc, X
Dash - Shift
